definition: (ecology) a group of interdependent organisms inhabiting the same region and interacting with each other
details:
noun
- (ecology) a group of interdependent organisms inhabiting the same region and interacting with each other
= synonyms: biotic community
- a group of people living in a particular local area
= example: a group of people living in a particular local area
- a group of nations having common interests
= example: a group of nations having common interests
- a district where people live
= synonyms: residential district, residential area
- common ownership
= example: common ownership
- agreement as to goals
= example: agreement as to goals
= synonyms: community of interests
